body_html:
@peterjc123

Thank you for your work in providing a Windows version of PyTorch.

I am encountering the same issue as reported by other users:

File "C:\ProgramData\Miniconda3\envs\pytorch\lib\site-packages\torch_init_.py", line 63, in
from torch._C import *

ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.

using Spyder which is also Qt based.

Windows 10 x64
GeForce 1080 Ti (Pascal)
CUDA 8
cuDNN 6 for CUDA 8
MKL 2018
VS 2017
Python 3.6

Downloaded and installed the WHL
Environment: APPVEYOR_BUILD_WORKER_IMAGE=Visual Studio 2017, PYTHON_VERSION=3.6, TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST=Pascal

body:
@peterjc123

Thank you for your work in providing a Windows version of PyTorch.

I am encountering the same issue as reported by other users:

> File "C:\ProgramData\Miniconda3\envs\pytorch\lib\site-packages\torch\__init__.py", line 63, in <module>
>     from torch._C import *
> 
> ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.

using Spyder which is also Qt based.

Windows 10 x64
GeForce 1080 Ti (Pascal)
CUDA 8
cuDNN 6 for CUDA 8
MKL 2018
VS 2017
Python 3.6

Downloaded and installed the WHL 
Environment: APPVEYOR_BUILD_WORKER_IMAGE=Visual Studio 2017, PYTHON_VERSION=3.6, TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST=Pascal
